column3: ohun nyimpa bi a ɔyɛ onyifuranyi fi n’awoo mu."
Nnyɛ nyimpa yi na ɔyɛɛ bɔn
column5: na mbrɛ Nyankopɔn ndwuma bɛda edzi wɔ no mu ntsi a."

column4: yɛyɛ nyia ɔsomaa me no no ndwuma; na adzesaa reba a obi nnkotum ayɛ edwuma."
na ɔdze ntafi no yɛɛ dɛtse seraa n’enyiwa do
column7: Kɔ kɔhohor wɔ nsutaae Siloam mu (ne nkyerɛase nye
column8: Nyia wɔasoma no). Na osii mu kɔree kɔhohoree
column9: na ɔbae no nna ohu adze."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi no sɔnmufo nye hɔn a nkan no wohun no dɛ ɔyɛ ohuafo no see no dɛ
column3: Ana nnyɛ oyi na ɔtse hɔ serɛserɛ adze no?"
Ɔno nye yi; binom so see dɛ
column5: na ɔnye no sɛ; na nankasa dze ɔsee dɛ

column3: Nyimpa a wɔfrɛ no Jesus no yɛɛ dɛtse dze seraa m’enyi do
column5: Kɔ nsutaae Siloam mu kɔhohor; na mokɔree kɔhohoree nna muhu adze yi."

column2: "Wɔdze nyia nkan no ɔyɛ onyifuranyi no kɛmaa Farisiifo no."
"Na da a Jesus yɛɛ dɛtse na obuee n’enyiwa no yɛ ahomgyeda."
"Dɛm ntsi Farisiifo no so bisaa no bio
column3: mbrɛ osii hun adze. Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Dɛtse na ɔdze guu m’enyiwa do

column2: "Na Farisiifo no mu binom see dɛ
column4: osiandɛ onnsie ahomgyeda; binom so see dɛ
column5: Ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na nyimpa dzebɔnyɛnyi botum ayɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze a ɔtse dɛm yi? Na mpaapaamu baa hɔn mu."

column2: "Na Jewfo no anngye no ho asɛm no enndzi
column3: dɛ nkyɛ ɔyɛ onyifuranyi na afei ohu adze
column4: dze kodur dɛ wɔfrɛɛ nyia ohun adze no n’awofo."

column3: Ana hom ba a hom se wɔwoo no onyifuranyi no nye yi? Afei ɔyɛ dɛn na ohu adze yi?"
Yenyim dɛ hɛn ba nye yi
column4: yenyim so dɛ wɔwoo no onyifuranyi;"

column2: "na mbrɛ ɔyɛe na afei ohu adze yi dze
column3: yennyim; na nyimpa kor a obuee n’enyiwa no so
column4: yennyim; ɔnoara oenyin; hom mbisa no
nna Jewfo no apam dada dɛ
column5: sɛ obi paa mu ka dɛ ɔno nye Kraest no a

column2: "Na wɔfrɛɛ nyimpa a nkan no ɔyɛ onyifuranyi no ne mpɛn ebien
column6: yenyim dɛ nyimpa yi yɛ dzebɔnyɛnyi."

column3: Ɔyɛɛ wo dɛn? Oduaa dɛn buee w’enyiwa?"

column4: na hom enntsie; ebɛnadze ntsi na hom repɛ etsie bio? Ana hom so pɛ dɛ hom dan n’esuafo anaa?"

column3: na sɛ obi yɛ Nyankopɔn no somfo na ɔyɛ n’apɛdze a

column2: "Ofitsi dɛ wiadze hyɛɛ ase wɔnntsee dɛ obi ebue nyia wɔawo no onyifuranyi no n’enyiwa pɛn:"

column4: bɔn mu koraa na wɔwoo wo
column5: nna ɔwo na erekyerɛkyerɛ hɛn yi? Na wɔpaam no fii hɔ."

column2: "Jesus tsee dɛ wɔapam no efi edzi
column5: Ana egye Nyankopɔn Ba no dzi?"

column3: Ehu no na eso nyia ɔnye wo rekasa yi nye ɔno."

column4: megye midzi; na ɔkotowee sɔɔr no."

column3: Atsɛmbu ntsi na mebaa wiadze yi mu: ma hɔn a wonnhu adze no woeehu
column4: na hɔn a wohu adze no wɔaadan enyifurafo."

column2: "Na Farisiifo no mu bi a wɔnye no wɔ hɔ tsee nsɛm yi

column4: nkyɛ hom nnyi bɔn; na afei hom se dɛ
column5: Yehu adze: ntsi na hom bɔn aka hɔ no."
